analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Exchange.cancelOrder (/unique_chucks/21/0x475a8101fdde7f7246e31be77dd7dcb80f25d735.sol#195-213):
	External calls:
	- amountEther = calcAmountEther(orders[id].token,orders[id].price,orders[id].amount) (/unique_chucks/21/0x475a8101fdde7f7246e31be77dd7dcb80f25d735.sol#198-200)

Exchange.depositToken (/unique_chucks/21/0x475a8101fdde7f7246e31be77dd7dcb80f25d735.sol#226-238) does not use the value returned by external calls:

Exchange.withdrawToken (/unique_chucks/21/0x475a8101fdde7f7246e31be77dd7dcb80f25d735.sol#248-252) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-Token(tokenAddr).transfer(msg.sender,amount) (/unique_chucks/21/0x475a8101fdde7f7246e31be77dd7dcb80f25d735.sol)
